title: [Cancer] A new personalized tumor vaccine strategy induced strong, localized antitumor immunity and prevented the relapse of skin and colon tumors when tested in mice. It can be easily manufactured within a few days and efficiently boost CD8+ T cells to activate personalized immunotherapy.

[Health] Maternal obesity linked to increased risk of early-onset neonatal sepsis. One extra BMI unit, which is equivalent to about six pounds for a woman of average height and weight in this population, would translate into an 8% increase in risk of sepsis for the baby (Jun 2020, n=1,971,346)
